# [Interview #1158: OdysseyCon 2016, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1158#13)

#### Blightsong

In the end, how many bridge runs did Kaladin go on?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I didn't count them, uhhm, dozens. Probably not hundreds.
